headline: Palin to stump for Perdue in Georgia
author: Lexi Lonas
sentences:
David is an America First fighter with a proven record of results, and he will be an outstanding Governor of Georgia.?
Palins endorsement comes as she is running her own campaign to replace the late Rep. Don Young (R-Alaska).

Trump endorsed Palin soon after she announced her run for Congress, calling her tough and smart and will never back down.?
Former Vice President Mike Pence is among the Republicans lending help to Kemp.
Proud to have @SarahPalinUSAs endorsement and looking forward to having her join us in Savannah on Friday!? Perdue wrote on Twitter.
I believe David is the only candidate who can win the fight against Abrams, and thats why Im proud to endorse him,? Palin said.
The Hill has removed its comment section, as there are many other forums for readers to participate in the conversation.
Sarah Palin (R) will join ex-Sen. David Perdue for a rally in Georgia on Friday as Perdue seeks to defeat Gov.
Palins trip to Georgia brings the star power of the 2008 GOP vice presidential nominee to the state.
Perdue, who has been endorsed by former President Trump, is well behind in the polls against Kemp.
Pence will be attending an event to support Kemp on May 23, one day before primary voting begins.
Whoever wins the primary on Tuesday will face off against Democratic challenger Stacey Abrams.
A Fox News poll on Wednesday had Kemp at 60 percent support and Perdue at just 28 percent.
We invite you to join the discussion on Facebook and Twitter.
Brian Kemp in the Republican primary next week.
